summary: This is a court filing from a civil lawsuit (Case No. 08-CV-80811-Marra/Johnson) in the Southern District of Florida. The document is the Plaintiff's Notice of Serving Verified Answers to Second Interrogatories, which were propounded by defendant Jeffrey Epstein on August 28, 2009. The filing includes a service list of attorneys and a verification page signed by the Plaintiff.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the civil lawsuit (Case No. 08-CV-80811-Marra/Johnson). The Second Interrogatories were propounded by him on August 28, 2009.

events.title: Defendant Serves Second Interrogatories
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein, as the defendant, propounded Second Interrogatories to the Plaintiff in the civil case.

events.title: Plaintiff Files Verified Answers
events.description: The Plaintiff files a notice that Verified Answers to the Second Interrogatories have been served on the defendant's attorney.

keyFacts: This document is part of civil lawsuit 08-CV-80811-Marra/Johnson, where Jeffrey Epstein is a defendant.
The Plaintiff is responding to Second Interrogatories propounded by Epstein on August 28, 2009.
The document includes a service list of attorneys: Jack A. Goldberger, Bruce E. Reinhart, and Robert Critton.
The Plaintiff's answers are verified and sworn to on November 26, 2009, in Palm Beach County, Florida.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
